mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT qna_listnum, qna_title, qna_pdnum, qna_writer, qna_content, TO_CHAR(qna_regdate,'YYYY.MM.DD') AS qna_regdate FROM qnalist ORDER BY qna_listnum DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
SELECT ROWNUM rnum, title, content, TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY.MM.DD AM HH24:MI') regdate,type,state FROM service WHERE mem_num=#{mem_num} ORDER BY regdate asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qnalist(qna_listnum, qna_title, qna_pdnum, qna_writer, qna_content, qna_regdate) VALUES(qnalist_seq.NEXTVAL, #{qna_title}, #{qna_pdnum}, #{qna_writer}, #{qna_content} ,SYSDATE)
